title: Elegant Diamond Vaddanam with Peacock Motif and South Sea Pearls
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features vibrant Rubies (4.11ct) and Emeralds (7.02ct)
accentuated by lustrous South Sea Pearls (68.88ct). This Vaddanam showcases a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisitely crafted Vaddanam features a central peacock (Mayura) motif, a symbol of beauty and prosperity. The delicate diamond-studded patterns are inspired by traditional South Indian designs. The design is further enhanced by Emerald and Ruby embellishments. Lustrous South Sea pearls are elegantly suspended, adding a touch of sophistication. Fine detailing throughout the piece demonstrates exceptional artistry and craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white diamonds
complemented by the deep green of the Emeralds and the rich red of the Rubies. The South Sea pearls exhibit a creamy white color with subtle iridescence
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings
and half-saree functions (Langa Voni). This Vaddanam can also elevate your look for grand celebrations and special occasions
adding a touch of regal elegance.
description: This Vaddanam is more than just a piece of jewelry; it's an heirloom. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, rubies, and South Sea pearls makes it a valuable and timeless investment. The design beautifully blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibilities. The intricate craftsmanship ensures its durability and makes it a treasured possession for generations to come.
